Description: Glazed steatite commemorative scarab with the back missing, the prenomen of Amenhotep III inscribed beneath the legs on both sides, longitudinally pierced, the base inscribed with sixteen rows of hieroglyphs commemorating a wild bull hunt of Amenhotep III.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: George Willoughby Fraser
Bibliographic references: Blankenberg-Van Delden 1969 / The large commemorative scarabs of Amenhotep III (B1)
